biography: Eero is a highly accomplished golfer who hails from Vuosaari Golf Helsinki.  He has consistently demonstrated a strong presence at the prestigious Hector Trophée, participating in the event every year since 2022.

His dedication and skill are evident in his impressive track record, marked by a significant victory at the Hector Trophée VI, where he secured the coveted Victor trophy. This win solidified his reputation as a major contender in the tournament.

While the team competition of the Hector Trophée has yet to fall to Eero, his individual prowess is undeniable, having consistently placed among the tournament's top performers.  His refined technique and strategic game-play make him a formidable opponent for any competitor.

Eero's performance each year demonstrates not only talent, but also a commitment to continuous improvement. Golf fans eagerly await his participation at each year's Hector Trophée, recognizing that his presence raises the level of competition for every participant.
